name: Osmosis TTS

screenshots.caption: Double Click to search for words

short_description:
Osmosis TTS is a Text-to-Speech application with a built in browser and the ability to easily search for terms in the text using configurable search providers including search engines and dictionaries.    

It is particularly useful for language learning as one can easily search for foreign words using external dictionary websites. 

Text is spoken by copying text to the clipboard, and text can be queued up by continuing to copy new text to the clipboard while Osmosis TTS is speaking. 

Text is displayed in a large window which has configurable fonts and color for users with low vision. 

Other features include:  Saving text as a WAV file, MP3 encoding using LAME mp3 encoder, maintaining a search history, and ability to use and configure standard SAPI TTS voices.
summary: Text to Speech application with searching capabilities.
